sections.heading: of second trust.A reference in the Nebraska Uniform Trust Code to a trust instrument or terms of the trust includes a second-trust instrument and the terms of the second trust

30-4524.Terms of second trust.

A reference in the Nebraska Uniform Trust Code to a trust instrument or terms of the trust includes a second-trust instrument and the terms of the second trust.

SourceLaws 2020, LB808, ยง 34.

Cross ReferencesNebraska Uniform Trust Code, see section 30-3801.
